LI.P: We confess to GOD for FORGIVENESS
LI.Q: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness.

LI.P: We confess to PEOPLE for HEALING from our sin.
LI.Q: Therefore confess your sins to each other and pray for each other so that you may be healed. The prayer of a righteous person is powerful and effective.
